Message:
a really scary dream
where Big Sis wasn’t
here anymore.

When I woke up,
the first thing I did was
quickly nuzzle up against her.

Don’t ever leave me alone,
okay, Big Sis...?

With this, you’ll always
be here with me,

so you’ll save me
if I have a bad dream?

You’re so nice, Big Sis.
I love you.

This pretty rock here
is really precious to me,
but you can have it!

Now, I’ll always be
with you, too, Big Sis!

If you have a bad dream,
I’ll save you, too!

The two of us are gonna
be together forever!
